name: Pizza Scape
description:
My first Game for the low effort Jam.
You are a pizza and the pineapples are chasing you...until when will you be able to escape from the pineapple pizza disgusters? Attack!!! with the flying pepperonis.
-Move using ASWD keys.
-Shoot pepperonis using mouse and clicking.
-Quit the game pressing Escape Key.
Hope you enjoy :D
